Name: Rectitude
About the game: Rectitude, is a Sci-Fi visual novel that centers around Timothy, a renowned professor who creates a groundbreaking technology. You play as a trusted colleague of Tim's and help him navigate through some tough decisions, moral dilemmas and obstacles. Rectitude features an extensive script, multiple endings, full voice-acting and great original music and art.
Meta Title: Rectitude: Sep 28, 2021, Sean Robbins and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Rectitude? Check out the release date (Sep 28, 2021), developer insights from Sean Robbins, and a complete game summary.
